string-array.name: movie_words
string-array.item: Have courage and be kind.
Sometimes we need a little magic.
Hope is a good thing and maybe the best of things. And no good thing ever dies.
Get busy living or get busy dying.
It takes a strong man to save himself, and a great man to save another.
You got a dream, you gotta protect it.
"People can't do something themselves, they wanna tell you can't do it."
"There is an I in \"happiness\", there is no Y in \"happiness\", it's an I."
"I think it's hard winning a war with words."
"Sir, you're no gentleman. And you miss are no lady."
Tomorrow is another day.
You jump, I jump.
"We're the luckiest sons-of-bitches in the world."
All life is a game of luck.
To make each day count.
Destiny takes a hand.
You are my destiny.
"To eat or not to eat, that's a question."
When the world turns its back on you. You turn your back on the world.
"It's you, your scent, it's like a drug to me. You're like my personal brand of heroin."
Only for making me want you so badly.
I was unconditionally and irrevocably in love with him.
Your number was up the first time I met you.
"You can't change the past."
"Life was like a box of chocolates, you never know what you're gonna get."
Miracles happen every day.
"Money is not everything. There's MasterCard."
Love is photogenic. It needs darkness to develop.
"I'd have to lose 60 IQ points to be classified as \"smart\"."
"I haven't forgotten a single thing since the day my mother stopped breastfeeding me."
"You don't know good things till they are gone."
Sunlight creeps in between the curtains.
"Way to be forgotten. But that's how you get remembered."
I love you, always have, always will.
"There's nothing wrong to keep this secret if its truth will hurt someone."
"Look, eventually, you'll learn to do that on the inside."
"I'm a lot of things, but I'm not a quitter."
"Let's just send out positive energy, and the universe will provide."
Might as well face it. You and I are on our own.
"This guy has a brand-new apple. I've been eating the same apple for a week."
"It's our man-iversary."
I use the box that our soap comes in as a wallet.
There is no good and evil, there is only power and those too weak to seek it.
That suggests that what you fear most of all… is fear itself.
It is not our abilities that show what we truly are. It is our choices.
"I'm sorry, professor, but I must not tell lies."
Behind every great fortune, there is a crime.
Every man has one destiny.
You make the choice, and this is your price.
"Don't let anybody know what you are thinking."
Life is so beautiful.
So, love somebody else.
"Only don't tell me you're innocent. It insults my intelligence, makes me very angry."
Great people are not born with the great, but in the process of growing up show its great.
A man who is not a father will never be a real man.
Do not say impossible, nothing is impossible.
Whatever can happen, will happen.
On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your pain?
There. There.
Balalalala●—●
Success is a relative term. It brings so many relatives.
God made relatives. Thank God we can choose our friends.
The wise never marry. And when they marry they become otherwise.
Your future depends on your dreams. So go to sleep.
There should be a better way to start a day than waking up every morning.
Hard work never kills anybody. But why take the risk?
Work fascinates me. I can look at it for hours!
"Don't let idiots ruin your day."
I am sorry for what I said when I was hungry.
"I'm done with Winter! I want to fast-forward to Spring!"
"Nothing is really lost until Mom can't find it."
"You can't fix stupid but you can watch it on Facebook every day."
I never make the same mistake twice. I make it five or six times, just to be sure.
You were my cup of tea but I drink champagne now.
I hate two-faced people. I can never decide which side to slap first.
HOME: Where I can look ugly and enjoy it.
I may be crazy… but crazy is better than stupid!
It was you from the moment we met.
If you want to fly, you have to give up the things that weight you down.
Every woman is beautiful. Just takes the right man to see it.
Smile.
"KEEP CALM! IT'S FRIDAY!"
"You don't cross my mind.You live on it."
When I look into your eyes. I tend to lose my thoughts.
"Fall in love with someone that doesn't make you think love is hard."
"Sometimes I'm just like…I need a hug!"
If you are always trying to be NORMAL, you will never know how AMAZING you can be.
Time is shit.
Never give up!
One life ends… another begins.
Sometimes your whole life boils down to one insane move.
I see you.
Welcome to Caribbean!
"I'm Captain Jack Sparrow."
"Everything we've ever done has lead to this."
The only way for a pirate to make a living these days is by betraying other pirates.
I was nothing more than an almost innocent bystander.
There will come a moment when you have the chance to do the right thing.
"Let's put a smile on that face!"
"It's a funny world we live in, speaking of which, you wanna know how I got these scars?"
"I believe… whatever doesn't kill you simply makes you… stranger."
"You know, madness is a lot like gravity… Sometimes all you need is a little push."
It does not to do dwell on dreams, and forget to live.
There are more important things: friendship and bravery.
"It's not much, but it's home."
The ones that love us never really leave us. And you can always find them in here.
